mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(email, password, name, gender, birth, fcm_token, phone, address, reg_date) VALUES( #{user.email}, #{user.password}, #{user.name}, #{user.gender}, #{user.birth}, #{user.fcmToken}, #{user.phone}, #{user.address}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET password = #{newPassword} WHERE email = #{email}
UPDATE user SET refresh_token = #{refreshToken} WHERE email = #{email}
